name: Charge!
description: Elite Shout. Allies in earshot lose the Crippled condition. For 5...11...13 seconds, these allies move 33% faster.

name: For Great Justice!
description: Shout. For 20 seconds, whenever you gain adrenaline, you gain 100% more.

name: For Great Justice! (PvP)
description: Shout. For 8 seconds, when you hit with an attack, you gain 1 additional strike of adrenaline.

name: Shields Up!
description: Shout. For 5...10...11 seconds, you and all party members within earshot gain +60 armor against incoming projectile attacks.

name: Watch Yourself!
description: Shout. Party members within earshot gain +5...21...25 armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after 10 incoming attacks.

name: Watch Yourself! (PvP)
description: Shout. Party members within earshot gain +5...21...25 armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after 1...3...3 incoming attack[s].

name: Axe Rake
description: Axe Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound, you strike for +1...8...10 damage, and that foe becomes Crippled for 15 seconds.

name: Balanced Stance
description: Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you cannot be knocked down and you do not suffer extra damage from a critical attack.

name: Battle Rage
description: Elite Stance. For 5...17...20 seconds, you move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from attacks. Battle Rage ends if you use any non-adrenal skills.

name: Berserker Stance
description: Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline. Berserker Stance ends if you use a skill.

name: Bull's Strike
description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits a moving foe, you strike for +5...25...30 damage, and your target is knocked down.

name: Cleave
description: Elite Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...26...30 damage.

name: Counter Blow
description: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits an attacking foe, that foe is knocked down.

name: Cyclone Axe
description: Axe Attack. Perform a spinning axe attack striking for +4...10...12 damage to all adjacent opponents.

name: Defensive Stance
description: Stance. For 1...4...5 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. When Defensive Stance ends, you gain one strike of adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum 0...3...4).

name: Devastating Hammer
description: Elite Hammer Attack. If Devastating Hammer hits, your target is knocked down and suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.

name: Dismember
description: Axe Attack. If it hits, this axe blow will inflict a Deep Wound on the target foe, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

name: Disrupting Chop
description: Axe Attack. If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.

name: Distracting Blow
description: Melee Attack. Swipe your weapon at the target, dealing no damage but disrupting the target's current action (and the actions of foes adjacent to your target).

name: Endure Pain
description: Skill. For 7...16...18 seconds you have an additional 90...258...300 Health.

name: Executioner's Strike
description: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.

name: Final Thrust
description: Sword Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Final Thrust hits, you deal 1...32...40 more damage. This damage is doubled if your target was below 50% Health.

name: Frenzy
description: Stance. For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.

name: Gash
description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits a Bleeding foe, you strike for 5...17...20 more damage and that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

name: Hammer Bash
description: Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Hammer Bash hits, your target is knocked down.

name: Hamstring
description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, your target is Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds, slowing his[sic] movement.

name: Healing Signet
description: Signet. You gain 82...154...172 Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.

name: Heavy Blow
description: Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If this attack hits a foe suffering from Weakness, that foe is knocked down and you strike for +1...24...30 damage.

name: Hundred Blades
description: Elite Skill. For 15 seconds, whenever you attack with a sword, all adjacent foes take 10...22...25 slashing damage.

name: Irresistible Blow
description: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If Irresistible Blow is blocked, your target is knocked down and takes 5...17...20 damage.

name: Mighty Blow
description: Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.

name: Power Attack
description: Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.

name: Savage Slash
description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you deal 1...32...40 extra damage.

name: Seeking Blade
description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits you strike for +1...16...20 damage. If Seeking Blade is blocked, your target begins Bleeding for 25 seconds and takes 1...16...20 damage.

name: Seven Weapons Stance
description: Elite Stance. For 3...17...20 seconds, your weapon attributes are increased by +1...12...15 and you attack 33% faster. PvE Skill

name: Sever Artery
description: Sword Attack. If this attack hits, the opponent begins Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds, losing Health over time.

name: Shield Bash
description: Skill. For 5...10...11 seconds, while wielding a shield, the next attack skill used against you is blocked. If it was a melee skill, your attacker is knocked down and that skill is disabled for an additional 15 seconds.

name: Sprint
description: Stance. For 8...13...14 seconds, you move 25% faster.

name: Staggering Blow
description: Hammer Attack. If this hammer blow hits, your target will suffer from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.

name: Swift Chop
description: Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +1...16...20 damage. If Swift Chop is blocked, target foe takes 1...16...20 damage and suffers a Deep Wound for 20 seconds.

name: Thrill of Victory
description: Melee Attack. If this blow hits, you deal +20...36...40 damage. If you have more Health than target foe, you gain 1...2...2 strike[s] of adrenaline.

name: Warrior's Cunning
description: Skill. For 5...10...11 seconds, your melee attacks cannot be blocked.

name: Wild Blow
description: Melee Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If it hits, this attack will result in a critical hit and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.
